hero.title: Our Heritage
hero.subtitle: Redefining Ivory Coast's cashew industry through vertical integration

ceo.title: A Message From Our CEO
ceo.message: "AfriNuts Export represents more than a business - it's the culmination of three generations of cashew farming in Odienné. As someone born into this tradition, I've witnessed both the challenges facing local farmers and the immense potential of our region. Our mission is to transform Ivory Coast's cashew sector by moving beyond raw exports to value-added processing, while maintaining ethical sourcing and community reinvestment. Through our integrated model - from our 50-hectare sustainable farm to future processing facilities - we're creating direct connections between African producers and global markets. We measure success not just in profits, but in lasting impact: training farmers, implementing sustainable practices, and supporting community development. This is our shared opportunity to build an agricultural legacy that benefits all stakeholders - from the families who cultivate our cashews to the consumers who enjoy them worldwide."

brand.title: Our Commitment
brand.text: AfriNuts Export delivers premium Ivory Coast cashews through sustainable farming and meticulous processing. We combine West Africa's agricultural heritage with international quality standards to meet growing global demand for traceable, responsibly-sourced products.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become West Africa's leading cashew exporter by 2040 through quality innovation, sustainable practices, and positive community impact.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To produce premium cashew products through sustainable farming, rigorous quality control, and equitable partnerships with local growers.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Quality, Sustainability, Community Partnership, and Innovation guide every aspect of our operations.

pledge.title: 10% Reinvestment Pledge
pledge.text: We allocate 10% of annual profits to local development projects including education, infrastructure, and religious institutions.

water.title: Water Access Initiative
water.text: Developing sustainable water solutions for farming communities in our operational areas.

religion.title: Community Infrastructure
religion.text: Supporting the construction and maintenance of essential community institutions.

farm.title: Our Sustainable Farm in Odienné
farm.text: At the heart of Ivory Coast's cashew-producing region lies our 50-hectare family farm - the cornerstone of AfriNuts Export. Currently developing our plantation for first harvest in 2031, we're implementing sustainable growing practices that enrich both the land and surrounding communities.
